name: Mcdonald's Farm
description:
(The game is about different ways chickens can be grown for meat. For example, in a biological way or more as a factory farm.)

New Mcdonald has a farm. Pet chickens, make fences,  slay chickens, talk to chickens, sell their meat and more. Do whatever you feel like doing!

Meet the refugee downwards at the beach if you need help.

The controls might have a bit of a learning curve, but we focused more on content on this build. 

AWSD to move around.

You can interact by left-clicking on things with the mouse and sometimes by colliding against objects. Right clicking is used to place objects in the inventory.

Made for the "I can't draw but want to make a game" Jam

Aren't chickens the best<3.
Any feedback is appreciated.
